name: Basic VPS Plan - Ubuntu 22.04
description: Entry-level VPS with 1 vCPU, 1GB RAM, 20GB SSD storage. Perfect for small websites, development environments, and basic applications. Includes Ubuntu 22.04 LTS with full root access.

name: Standard VPS Plan - CentOS 8
description: Standard VPS with 2 vCPU, 4GB RAM, 50GB SSD storage. Ideal for medium traffic websites, databases, and business applications. Includes CentOS 8 with managed security updates.

name: Premium VPS Plan - Debian 11
description: High-performance VPS with 4 vCPU, 8GB RAM, 100GB SSD storage. Perfect for high-traffic websites, e-commerce platforms, and enterprise applications. Includes Debian 11 with advanced monitoring.

name: Enterprise VPS Plan - Windows Server 2022
description: Enterprise-grade VPS with 8 vCPU, 16GB RAM, 200GB SSD storage. Designed for large-scale applications, virtual desktops, and Windows-based workloads. Includes Windows Server 2022 Standard.

name: Managed VPS Service - Rocky Linux
description: Fully managed VPS service with 2 vCPU, 4GB RAM, 50GB SSD storage. Includes 24/7 support, automated backups, security monitoring, and performance optimization. Rocky Linux 8 with cPanel included.

name: GPU VPS Plan - AlmaLinux 8
description: GPU-accelerated VPS with 4 vCPU, 16GB RAM, 100GB SSD storage, NVIDIA T4 GPU. Perfect for AI/ML workloads, video processing, and computational tasks. AlmaLinux 8 with CUDA support.

name: Backup VPS Service
description: Automated backup service for VPS instances. Includes daily backups, 30-day retention, off-site storage, and one-click restore functionality. Compatible with all VPS plans.

name: Load Balancer Service
description: High-availability load balancer service. Distributes traffic across multiple VPS instances for improved performance and reliability. Includes health monitoring and automatic failover.

name: SSL Certificate Bundle
description: SSL certificate bundle including domain validation, wildcard support, and automated renewal. Compatible with all VPS plans and includes installation support.

name: DDoS Protection Service
description: Advanced DDoS protection service with real-time threat detection and mitigation. Includes traffic filtering, rate limiting, and 24/7 security monitoring for all VPS instances.

name: Monitoring & Alerting Service
description: Comprehensive monitoring service with real-time alerts, performance metrics, and uptime tracking. Includes custom dashboards and notification systems for proactive management.

name: 24/7 Premium Support
description: Premium support service with dedicated support team, priority ticket handling, and guaranteed response times. Includes phone, email, and live chat support for critical issues.
